survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace AI-Powered Scheduling Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and experiences with AI-powered scheduling tools implemented in the workplace to optimize productivity and work-life balance.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the AI-powered scheduling tool provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all possible frequency ranges.

questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
